item.title: Here are Monday's biggest analyst calls: Nvidia, Apple, Tesla, Roblox, Caterpillar, Uber, Zillow, Amazon & more

item.title: Morgan Stanley downgrades U.S. Steel, sees limited growth opportunities ahead
item.description: Shares have pulled back 20% over the past year.

item.title: KeyBanc upgrades Zillow, calls for more than 25% upside ahead as home sales climb
item.description: KeyBanc said Zillow has more room to run ahead as the housing market improves.

item.title: Modelo importer Constellation Brands gets a downgrade from Piper Sandler on U.S. tariffs
item.description: Shares were more than 5% lower before the opening bell on Monday.
